title: [Unturned]Tips(小贴士)内容翻译
author: 无名人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 无名人 于 2016-4-4 19:04 编辑 

You can hotkey an item in your hands slot by right-clicking it and then pressing a number key [3-9].
你可以右键一个物品并按下3到9的数字键来通过快捷键快速切换手上的物品。

You can quickly equip an item by holding [Ctrl] and then right-clicking it.
你可以对着一个物品按住[Ctrl]键并点击鼠标右键来快速装备上。

You can quickly drop an item by holding [Ctrl] and then left-clicking it.
你可以对着一个物品按住[Ctrl]键并点击鼠标左键来快速丢弃。

You can turn the sirens in a police vehicle on/off by pressing [Ctrl] as the driver.
你可以通过按[Ctrl]键开启或关闭警用载具的警笛。

You can copy transforms in the editor by pressing Ctrl+B and paste them by pressing Ctrl+N.
你可以在地图编辑器中按Ctrl+B复制一个实体的位置以及角度，然后按Ctrl+N粘贴实体

Your ranger weapons and attachments are more durable than their military counterparts.
你的俄制武器和俄制配件比军用的更耐用。

You can use umbrellas to lower your falling speed and prevent fall damage.
你可以装备上雨伞来降低降落速度和免疫摔落伤害。

You can heal other players by right-clicking on them while holding a medical item.
你可以拿着医疗物品对着玩家点击鼠标右键来治疗。

You can rotate objects while building by holding right-click and then dragging the mouse.
你可以在建造的时候按住鼠标右键并拖动鼠标来旋转实体。

Your crafting materials impacts stats and from best to worst are: Metal -> Pine -> Maple -> Birch
你制作物品的材料会影响到属性，从最好到最差的是:金属 -> 松木 -> 枫木 -> 桦木

You can quickly dequip an item by pressing [Tilde].
你可以按[Tilde]键来快速放下刚刚手上拿着的物品。

You can turn nightvision and headlamps on/off by pressing [N].
你可以按[N]键开启/关闭夜视仪或头灯。

You can quickly transfer an item in/out of storage by holding [Ctrl] and then right-clicking it.
你可以按住[Ctrl]键然后鼠标右键把你的物品快速储存或取出。

You can quickly surface while swimming by holding [{0}].
你可以按住[Space]键快速游上水面。

You can eventually wiggle your way out of handcuffs by repeatedly tapping [Q] and [E].
你可以反复按[Q]键和[E]键来解开手铐。

You can protect an area from zombie spawns by placing a safezone radiator, but it also blocks item spawns.
你可以放置安全区域生成器来防止丧尸刷新，但是也会阻断物品刷新。

You can prevent players from building in an area by placing a claim flag.
你可以放置占领旗子来防止玩家在该区域进行建筑。

You can join a group with your friends to disable friendlyfire, share buildables, see eachother on the map and win arena as a team.
你可以加入和你朋友同一个组来防止队友伤害，共用上锁的建筑，在地图上可以互相看见对方，在大逃杀模式中一起获胜。

You can view a map of the area if you have a chart or GPS by pressing [M].
如果你有海图或GPS你可以按下[M]键来查看地图。

You can summon a wave of zombies for great loot drops by placing a horde beacon.
你可以放置一个尸潮信标来生成一波一波丧尸来获取丰富的物资。

You can use the horn of a vehicle by pressing [Mouse #1] as the driver.
驾驶载具的时候你可以按[鼠标左键]来使用喇叭。

You can turn the headlights in a vehicle on/off by pressing [Mouse #2] as the drive.
驾驶载具你可以按[鼠标右键]来打开车灯。

You can snap an object's position and rotation by holding [Left+Control].
你可以按住[左键+Ctrl]键来控制实体的位置和角度。

You can hide your name/avatar/admin status/gold ownership by creating an anonymous character.
你可以通过角色管理选项使用匿名来隐藏你的ID/管理员/黄金会员信息。

You can quickly grab an item from a rifle rack by holding [Ctrl+F] and then interacting with it.
你可以按下[Ctrl+F]键来快速从枪架取下物品。

You can quickly grab an item from a rifle rack by holding [Ctrl+F] and then interacting with it.
你可以按下[Ctrl+F]键来快速从枪架取下物品。

You can activate the Skycrane's electromagnet by pressing [Ctrl] while hovering over a vehicle.
当载具悬停在空中起重机机翼下面部分的时候，你可以按下[Ctrl]键启动或关闭电磁铁

You can swap seats in a vehicle by pressing the function keys [F1-F12].
当你坐在载具上的时候你可以通过[F1-F12]来切换座位

Your loot's rarity from best to worst is: Legendary -> Epic -> Rare -> Uncommon -> Common
你搜刮到的物资的稀有度从最好到最差的是: 传说 -> 史诗 -> 稀有 -> 罕见 -> 普通

You can rotate items in your inventory by pressing [R]键.
你可以在背包中按下R键来旋转物品。

最后更新2016.4.4
